Class.name: PApplet
Class.span: Represents an interactive animation that runs in the Pygame window and is modelled on Processing’s PApplet class. Sketch and Environment are subclasses which extend PApplet.

Method.name: PApplet(setup, draw, eventMap)
Method.span: The constructor creates a PApplet instance. Use the run method to run the sketch.
Method.Arg: An unbound function that initializes the sketch. A reference to the sketch.
An unbound function that draws one frame of the animation. A reference to the sketch.

Arg.name: eventMap
Arg.span: A dictionary that maps event types or classes (keys) to handler functions (values). The value None can be used as a key to specify a handler for events that do not have a custom handler. The constructor will also accept a single function to handle all events in place of a dictionary.

Class.Method: Run the sketch. The initial size of the sketch in pixels. A string specifying the caption for the sketch window. The path to an image to be used as the window icon. Change to 0 to make the sketch non-resizable.
Change the size and/or display mode of the sketch. The size of the sketch in pixels. The new display mode.

Method.name: loadFont(name, size, bold, italic, lineHeight)
Method.span: Load a system font or font file.
Method.Arg: The name of the font or font file to load.
Whether the font is to be rendered as bold face.
Whether the font is to be rendered in italics.
Whether the size is to be interpreted as the line height. This is slower but produces more consistent sizes among different typefaces.

Method.name: useFonts(path)
Method.span: A class method that specifies a JSON file defining font substitutions. If not called, "fonts.json" in the scropr folder will be used.

Method.name: pseudonym(pseudo, name)
Method.span: Get or set a font pseudonym.
Method.Arg: If specified, the font to use.

Class.Method: Set the sketch background. An image to be used for the sketch background. The sketch aspect ratio will be locked (except when maximized) to match the background image. A color to be drawn as the background. If both arguments are given, the image will be blitted onto a background of the specified color.

Method.name: randPixel()
Method.span: The coordinates of a random pixel within the sketch.

PropA.name: hRatio
PropA.span: The ratio of the current sketch height to the original height.

PropA.name: saveName
PropA.span: A string format template to use as the file name for individual captured frames.

PropA.name: recordName
PropA.span: A string format template to use as the file name for sequences of captured frames.

PropA.name: recordGui
PropA.span: A bool specifying whether frames are to be recorded after or before GUI controls are drawn.

PropA.name: cursor
PropA.span: The cursor to be displayed within the sketch. The cursor can be a builtin or custom cursor from pygame.cursor or you can use these cursors from scropr.util: ARROW, DIAMOND, MOVE, TEXT, CROSS, HAND, MENU, NO_CURSOR.

PropA.name: light
PropA.span: A color specifying the ambient light; the sketch will be tinted based on this color.

PropR.name: frameCount
PropR.span: The total number of frames that have been drawn (including the current frame).

PropR.name: draw
PropR.span: A reference to the current drawing function; this attribute is set by the constructor based on its draw argument.

PropR.name: eventMap
PropR.span: A dictionary that maps event types (keys) to handler functions (values); this attribute is set by the constructor to the dictionary passed as the eventMap argument.

PropR.name: center
PropR.span: The coordinates of the center of the sketch.

PropR.name: centerX
PropR.span: The x-coordinate of the center of the sketch.

PropR.name: centerY
PropR.span: The y-coordinate of the center of the sketch.

PropR.name: aspect
PropR.span: The aspect ratio of the background image; None if no background image has been set.

PropR.name: gui
PropR.span: A reference to the sketch’s GUI manager; this will be None for PApplet instances but will return an object for Sketch and its subclasses.
